lines.text: Maybe they were planning to summon some kind of demon... and he didn't want it to know he was there.
So he decided to disguise himself as a statue, to hide from it!
Didn't Slick interrupt that ritual, though?
Yeah, yeah, it's obvious enough we don't have to bother right away.
It doesn't matter if the ritual was interrupted or not- that might've been the plan before things got crazy.
He could've already been a statue when Slick showed up!
What, he could cast spells like that?
He <c=#FF00FF>couldn't have seen Slick</c> to g-generate that <c=#0000FF>Living Memory,</c> if he were already inside.
Your theory- I'm- I'm not impressed.
Nngh... well, I guess you're right...
